content:
When booking a guided tour, it's essential to understand the cancellation policies of each company, as they can vary significantly. Here's a more detailed overview of the cancellation policies for Trafalgar, Contiki, and EF Go Ahead Tours:

**Trafalgar**

* **Cancellation fees:**
	+ 60 days or more prior to departure: $200 per person
	+ 59-30 days prior to departure: 25% of total tour cost
	+ 29-15 days prior to departure: 50% of total tour cost
	+ 14 days or less prior to departure: 100% of total tour cost
* **Changes to booking:**
	+ $30 per person for changes made 60 days or more prior to departure
	+ $50 per person for changes made 59-30 days prior to departure
	+ No changes allowed 29 days or less prior to departure
* **Refunds:**
	+ Refunds will be made in the original form of payment
	+ Refunds may take up to 6-8 weeks to process
* **Special exceptions:**
	+ If Trafalgar cancels a tour, you'll receive a full refund or a credit towards another tour.
	+ If you're unable to travel due to a natural disaster or government travel advisory, Trafalgar may offer a refund or credit.

**Contiki**

* **Cancellation fees:**
	+ 60 days or more prior to departure: $200 per person
	+ 59-30 days prior to departure: 25% of total tour cost
	+ 29-15 days prior to departure: 50% of total tour cost
	+ 14 days or less prior to departure: 100% of total tour cost
* **Changes to booking:**
	+ $30 per person for changes made 60 days or more prior to departure
	+ $50 per person for changes made 59-30 days prior to departure
	+ No changes allowed 29 days or less prior to departure
* **Refunds:**
	+ Refunds will be made in the original form of payment
	+ Refunds may take up to 6-8 weeks to process
* **Special exceptions:**
	+ If Contiki cancels a tour, you'll receive a full refund or a credit towards another tour.
	+ If you're unable to travel due to a natural disaster or government travel advisory, Contiki may offer a refund or credit.

**EF Go Ahead Tours**

* **Cancellation fees:**
	+ 90 days or more prior to departure: $100 per person
	+ 89-60 days prior to departure: 25% of total tour cost
	+ 59-30 days prior to departure: 50% of total tour cost
	+ 29 days or less prior to departure: 100% of total tour cost
* **Changes to booking:**
	+ $25 per person for changes made 90 days or more prior to departure
	+ $50 per person for changes made 89-60 days prior to departure
	+ No changes allowed 59 days or less prior to departure
* **Refunds:**
	+ Refunds will be made in the original form of payment
	+ Refunds may take up to 6-8 weeks to process
* **Special exceptions:**
	+ If EF Go Ahead Tours cancels a tour, you'll receive a full refund or a credit towards another tour.
	+ If you're unable to travel due to a natural disaster or government travel advisory, EF Go Ahead Tours may offer a refund or credit.

**Key differences:**

* Trafalgar and Contiki have similar cancellation policies, with the same fee structure and refund process.
* EF Go Ahead Tours has a more generous cancellation policy, allowing changes up to
